BR_text.BRsummary: Cannot save visualization of topic model to custom filepath
BR_text.BRdescription:
If I provide a filepath, e.g.
 top_model.visualize_documents(doc_topics=top_model.get_doctopics(), filepath="./outgraph.html")
 then the graph is not stored in the provided html file but instead in /tmp/t.html
 Should be:
 <denchmark-code>if filepath is not None:
             bp.output_file(filepath)
             bp.save(p)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 
 
 
 ktrain/ktrain/text/eda.py
 
 
          Line 450
       in
       5e927f0
 
 
 
 
 
 
  if filepath is not None:

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for reporting issue.  This fix was included in v0.11.2.
